directions: Cook oatmeal with milk in individual microwave-safe bowls according to package directions. Stir 1 tbsp (15 mL) cheese and 1 tsp (5 mL) parsley into each serving.
Top each serving with cherry tomatoes, cucumber and half an egg. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and remaining parsley.
ingredients: 4 (28 g) packets Quaker® Regular Instant Oatmeal
1/4 cup shredded white Cheddar or mozzarella cheese
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley or chives, divided
title: Quaker® Savoury Herb Oatmeal
